data.name: Operation Lovecraft: Fallen Doll Demo
data.supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 590
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
